topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a6ac1a6368722792000f00#post_55a6ac1a6368722792000f00
Couldn't go to the con I've been waiting all year for cuz it was too expensive.

Cant buy/do anything cuz we're budgeting. So I've been stuck home with nothing to do. 

Mom is going to Carolina with my Step Dad and she just told me how the fucking KKK are near around there doing something so now I'm worried.

Internets shitting the bed randomly.

Learning how Tiger's are possibly Going extinct. (For me that's a big deal since I love animals)

*Now Iwata is dead*.

Its like bad news month all around. 


"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a6ac436368721b01001230#post_55a6ac436368721b01001230

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55a6b27a6368726a650002bc#post_55a6b27a6368726a650002bc
theyre a Big Beat/Breakbeat duo from the 90s, their debut album Vegas is a classic that was played in every single rave back in the 90s, the rest of their albums arent bad but they never reached the level of greatness that one did, except for their newest album, it was pretty fucking bad.

youre not the only person who forgets about their existence, a lot of people have forgotten how much a gift they were to electronic music, which is a shame.
